menu.title: [- Help Menu]
menu.description: You asked for help, what item do you want to learn about?

first_level_child.title: [- Story Details]
first_level_child.description: This is a text based game, intro to what this help portion will be about

second_level_child.title: [- How do I win]
second_level_child.description: You can win by finding the boss and defeating him.

third_level_child.title: [- How to find the boss]
third_level_child.description: Boss Bezos spawns somewhere on the map, you need to search and find him!

third_level_child.title: [- How to kill the boss]
third_level_child.description: You need special items to defeat Bezos. They are sword, shield, potion, ...

first_level_child.title: [- Game Controls]
first_level_child.description: To play the game, you type commands into the console. There are a plethora of commands to choose from, here are a few options. To call any of these, it is [command] [option]

second_level_child.title: [- move]
second_level_child.description: to move around the game you say move [direction]. Directions are north, south, west, east.

second_level_child.title: [- pickup]
second_level_child.description: to pick up an item you say pickup [item]. If the item is in the room and can be picked up, it is added to your inventory.

second_level_child.title: [- drop]
second_level_child.description: to drop an item from your inventory you say drop [item] and if the item can be dropped, it will be removed from your inventory and into the room

second_level_child.title: [- attack]
second_level_child.description: to attack an enemy, say attack [monster]. MORE DETAILS LATER WHEN WE FIGURE OUT HOW IT WORKS
